English
During the Manchurian-ruled Qing Dynasty, Emperor Yong Zheng established a
secret assassination squad known as the Guillotines to eliminate all who
opposed him. Once heavily favored by the Emperor, the Guillotines are deemed
expendable once Emperor Qian Long ascends to the throne and adopts Western
ideas and technology. To consolidate his power under a new regime, the Emperor
continues to use the Guillotines to persecute the conquered Han Chinese in
a reign of terror and oppression.
